name: TOON CLIMBER
description:
"Somewhere in this world there are islands floating in the sky."

When you were a child, you were very interested in this folktale.
But as you grew up, you forgot about it.
As an adult, your hobby is mountain climbing. You traveled all over the world.
One day, you were near the top of a mountain when a blizzard struck.
You hid behind a rock and spent what seemed like an eternity.
Suddenly, the blizzard stops and the weather becomes clear.
An unbelievable sight spreads out in front of you.
It reminded you of the folktale that had fascinated you as a child.

This is a simple 3D action game.
It's a short adventure of about 15 minutes in total.
But maybe you will experience a lot of game overs.
However, this game does not have a save function. If you're game over, you'll have to restart this adventure over.
Because you have only one life...

Please enjoy the thrill of your next action.

Controls:

Keyboard & mouse
WASD - Move
Space - Jump
Mouse movement - Look around
ESC - Quit

Gamepad
Left stick - Move
X - Jump
Right stick - Look around
ESC - Quit
